er_rules.message: Call 911 or go to ER immediately - possible heart attack
Call 911 or go to ER immediately - possible heart attack
Go to ER immediately - possible meningitis
Go to ER immediately - possible meningitis
Call 911 immediately - possible stroke
Call 911 immediately - possible stroke
Call 911 immediately - possible stroke
Go to ER immediately - possible aneurysm or stroke
Go to ER immediately - possible aneurysm
Call 911 immediately - severe allergic reaction
Call 911 immediately - possible anaphylaxis
Go to ER immediately - severe dehydration in child
Go to ER immediately - fever in infant under 3 months
Go to ER immediately - first seizure requires evaluation
Go to ER immediately - altered mental status
Go to ER - severe abdominal pain requires evaluation
Go to ER immediately - vomiting blood
Go to ER - possible gastrointestinal bleeding
Call 911 or go to ER immediately - severe breathing difficulty
Call 911 immediately - lack of oxygen
